entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 p.m. NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 6:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: SE 25 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain near midnight. Blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 this evening then south 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle or showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
